com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheController, LocalController, MockController

    public interface Controller
    Bot Controller interface. The controller routes a request to the underlying bot server(s). A controller may use another controller as a down handler, then the request or a tempered request will be passed on to the downhandler. This is used to create middle layers (e.g. distributed calls).

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Attach a down handling controller.

      Request a batch of bots to be started.
